metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7480 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The blkcg_init_queue function in block/blk-cgroup.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.11 allows local users to cause a denial of service (double free)or possibly have unspecified other impact by triggering a creation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required
